text:
Ah Kou Minced Meat Noddles (3-star): Recommend by my friend who rate it at 5-star.

Its special as more vinegar taste and has lots of deep gravy mushroom and fried fish.

It has been around since 1945 and move from Hong Lim to Bt Batok.

PS: Updated on 28/2/2022: Closed for a long time

====

Updated: 28/2/2022

The Western Food is good, food are btw 3-Star to 5-Star

I like their Smoky BBQ Drumlets which comes with cole slaw

Thanks to my friends who introduced me to this place . Auntie was very nice and food to my surprise was even nicer.
They cook everything without onion & garlic.
Must try teng leaves fried rice, and soup.

Came for Soon Heng wanton mee but it was closed. Decided to support the noodle stall. Ordered laksa takeaway $5. Miserable. laksa comes without fish cake / tau Pok or egg. Literally got served noodles and prawns.

Had western food. They moved from 376 coffee shop. Followed them here. Love the black pepper chicken chop! Really value for money. Chicken is tasty and fries are crispy. Busy coffeeshop but ample seating.

Western Meal stall is great. Generous portion with reasonable price.
Chicken Chop Spaghetti is $6.50. Takeaway add on $0.20.
